Component.Name: ProvisionWebsite
Component.description: This is a Windows app that helps you provision an IIS website with its content served via Corkscrew. The tool will provision the website in IIS, create a site in Corkscrew and, configure the web application folder with one click. It uses .NET Framework 4.6 technology. The app will require connectivity to your Corkscrew_ConfigDB database to function. This app must be installed on the system where you wish to provision the website.
